weka.core.converters
Class ODFLoader

java.lang.Object
  weka.core.converters.AbstractLoader
      weka.core.converters.AbstractFileLoader
          weka.core.converters.ODFLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, BatchConverter, FileSourcedConverter, Loader, URLSourcedLoader, EnvironmentHandler, OptionHandler, RevisionHandler
public class ODFLoader
extends AbstractFileLoader
implements BatchConverter, URLSourcedLoader, OptionHandler

Reads a source that is in the ODF spreadsheet format.
For instance, a spreadsheet generated with OpenOffice.org.

Valid options are: 

 -sheet <index>
  The index of the sheet to load; 'first' and 'last' are accepted as well.
 -M <str>
  The string representing a missing value.
  (default: '')
For a tutorial on ODFDOM, see:
http://java.dzone.com/news/integrate-openoffice-java

Version:
$Revision: 8889 $
Author:
FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz), Geertjan Wielenga
See Also:
Loader, Serialized Form

getDataSet
